title: Can't log in on home PC. Says pass not right but phone still logged in
body: I can not log into my game from my computer. The pass no longer works and I can't reset it or get the game to send me the pass or send me my username. Says that the pass region and name do not match. BUT I am still logged in on my phone under the same name pass and region as I am writing this post on my phone right now. I can't log onto the boards from my home computer as I get the same message that none of my information matches. What it the issue here?

replies.body: If you can't get signed in with your usual password on any pc you try, and you aren't getting the password recovery emails, there's a pretty good chance someone was able to hack your account and get that info changed without you knowing. Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap so they can verify you as the owner and repair any damage that happened!
